# HMError.Code.roomForHomeCannotBeUpdated

**Case**

An attempt to change the room that represents the entire home.

## Declaration

```swift
case roomForHomeCannotBeUpdated
```

## Home and room errors

- **HMError.Code.maximumAccessoriesOfTypeInHome**: The home already has the maximum number of accessories of the given type.
- **HMError.Code.roomForHomeCannotBeInZone**: An attempt to add the room that represents the entire home to a zone.

items.description: The home already has the maximum number of accessories of the given type.
